text-node.description: Prepares the Cart sections for Checkout pages.
Gets the shipping methods and sets the default shipping method to Basket.
Sets the shipping method and returns the result as JSON response.
Add product to mini cart. Renders a new mini cart and not a full cart.
This branch is used to revalidate existing payment instruments in later checkout steps.
Checks if the basket has already a shipping address set and creates one, if not.
Renders the Recommendation sections for Checkout pages.
Verify if basket contain the same product
Verify if Shipping and Billing Address Equivalent
This takes any upsells we select on the last page and adds them to our cart
Attempts to update the basket from the attributes of the personinf form.
Checks if the basket has already a payment insrument set and update form, if yes.
Verifies a credit card against a valid card number and expiration date and possibly invalidates invalid form fields. If the verification was successful a credit card payment instrument is created.
Attempts to update the basket billing address with the attributes of the address form.
Attempts to update the basket shipping address with the attributes of the address form.
Attempts to update the basket email address with the attributes of the contactInf form.

pipelet-node.custom-name: Bind stateCode to sub form group
Bind stateCode to sub form group
Copy the email address to the basket,eveningphone to billing address,daytimephone to shipping

text-node.description: Temporarily removed Litle Payment verification from COCart-UpdatePersonInfo
